prompt: One statistic calculated for pitchers in baseball is called the earned run average, or ERA. Based on the boxplots, which of the following statistics is the same for both leagues?

chartConfig.description: Boxplots comparing ERA for pitchers in leagues A and B, showing outliers marked with asterisks

prompt: One way to measure the duration of subterranean disturbances such as earthquakes and mining is to calculate the root-mean-square time. The following histograms summarize the distributions of the root-mean-square times for two sources of disturbances. Based on the histograms, which of the following correctly compares the two distributions?

attachments.description: Histograms showing distributions of root-mean-square times for earthquake and mining disturbances

choices.value: The median of the earthquake disturbances is equal to the median of the mining disturbances.
The median of the earthquake disturbances is less than the median of the mining disturbances.
The range of the earthquake disturbances is equal to the range of the mining disturbances.
The range of the earthquake disturbances is less than the range of the mining disturbances.
The mode of the earthquake disturbances is equal to the mode of the mining disturbances.

prompt: Based on the summary statistics, which of the following gives the best comparison of the range and the interquartile range (IQR) of the two days?

choices.value: The range and IQR of hours played on Monday are both greater than the range and IQR of hours played on Saturday.
The range and IQR of hours played on Monday are both less than the range and IQR of hours played on Saturday.
The range and IQR of hours played on Monday are both equal to the range and IQR of hours played on Saturday.
The range of hours played on Monday is greater than the range of hours played on Saturday, and the IQR of hours played on Monday is less than the IQR of hours played on Saturday.
The range of hours played on Monday is less than the range of hours played on Saturday, and the IQR of hours played on Monday is greater than the IQR of hours played on Saturday.
